name: CFDSegmentedContentController
summary: Storyboard helper to change View Controller content based on a Segmented Control.
description:
CFDSegmentedContentController is an auxiliary View Controller class that may be used
in your storyboards to change content based on a Segmented Control in the Navigation
Bar, similar to a Tab Bar Controller. The purpose of this class is to get around the
limitation of a single Embed Segue for Container Views in IB. This Pod is mostly provided
as a way to publish an experiment, but in any case, it works and is helpful in solving
the problem at hand when you want to stay in Storyboard-land.
